title: Anatomy of an Apple - The Lessons Steve Taught Us
description:
Ninety days from bankruptcy, Apple brought home its founder in 1996. In less than a decade, Steve accomplished the impossible - Apple was now a trillion dollar juggernaut. Within these pages are the overlooked, misunderstood or misrepresented lessons that made it all possible and you won't find them anywhere else. Learn them all from a businessman who gets understands, challenges conventional wisdom and isn't afraid to tell it like it is.

Steve Jobs weathered the deepest betrayals, endured relentless public humiliations and was pushed to the brink of bankruptcy. When he returned he was welcomed home by an Apple that was just as battered and bruised as he was, and on the brink of the abyss. How these two entities healed each other is interesting, entertaining, and invaluable for your own turnaround!

New Edition
